Title: Second train for Russia’s sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 poised to arrive soon
Description: A second liquefaction train on a gravity-based structure to be installed at the sanctioned Novatek-operated 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 plant in Russia’s Gydan peninsula is close to the project and looks poised to arrive this weekend, boosting the facility's production capacity.
Author: CK

Title: France’s Elengy pushes back restart of Montoir LNG terminal yet again
Description: LNG terminal operator Elengy has pushed back the restart of its 8 mtpa Montoir LNG terminal in France to Aug. 19, prolonging the facility's unplanned maintenance by four more days.
Author: CK
